evidence.text: Declare unlawful, vacate, and set aside the New Conditions;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare unlawful, vacate, and set aside the New Conditions

evidence.text: Declare unlawful, vacate, and set aside Defendants' decision to include the New Conditions in individual award programs and in individual awards;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare unlawful, vacate, and set aside Defendants' decision to include the New Conditions in individual award programs and in individual awards

evidence.text: Stay the New Conditions in the respective agency policies, in any individual notices of funding opportunity, and in any awarded grants, pursuant to 5 U.S.C. § 705, and issue all other necessary and appropriate process to preserve status or rights pending conclusion of the review proceedings;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Stay the New Conditions in the respective agency policies, in any individual notices of funding opportunity, and in any awarded grants, pursuant to 5 U.S.C. § 705, and issue all other necessary and appropriate process to preserve status or rights pending conclusion of the review proceedings

evidence.text: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from including any of the New Conditions or any substantively similar condition in any NOFOs or awards, from requiring or permitting any funding recipient to impose any of the New Conditions or any substantively similar condition on subrecipients, and from otherwise imposing the New Conditions or any substantively similar condition on any funding recipient;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Preliminarily and permanently enjoin Defendants, their agents, and all persons acting in concert or participation with Defendants from including any of the New Conditions or any substantively similar condition in any NOFOs or awards, from requiring or permitting any funding recipient to impose any of the New Conditions or any substantively similar condition on subrecipients, and from otherwise imposing the New Conditions or any substantively similar condition on any funding recipient

evidence.text: Award Plaintiffs reasonable costs and attorneys’ fees;
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Award Plaintiffs reasonable costs and attorneys’ fees

evidence.text: Grant any other relief that the Court deems fit and proper.
evidence.source_document: Complaint for Declaratory and Injunctive Relief

add_extracted.value: Plaintiff: Grant any other relief that the Court deems fit and proper
